name: Kingdom Of Loathing Dark theme -- reverse images
description: PLEASE DO NOT USE STYLISH. It was sold to an ad company. On firefox, I recommend stylrrr. On chrome, I don't know of any good extension, so my recommendation is to enable developer mode and find an old version of stylish to install. This is a Kingdom of loathing dark theme which is as far as I know the only one which also reverses images. I created it because I wanted a dark theme, but all of the ones I encountered used the images as normal, which IMO is just ugly.
